    <tr>
      <td colspan="2"><b>Goal</b></td>
      <td colspan="4">Get a list of all projects that the user is participating in and provide a detail view for a single project.</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td colspan="2"><b>Preconditions</b></td>
      <td colspan="4">The user is a member of the project.</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td colspan="2"><b>Basic flow</b></td>
      <td colspan="4"> 
      
<OL>
<LI>The user chooses _my projects_</LI>
<LI>The system displays a list of all projects that the user is participating in</LI>
<LI>The user selects a project</LI>
<LI>The system provides the user with detailed information about the project. The form shows: <ul>
<li>name</li>
<li>description</li>
<li>all project members</li>
<li>the names of all decisions in descending order sorted by the date of the last change</li>
<li>the names of all iterations in descending order sorted by end date</li>
</ul></LI>
</OL>
      
      </td>
